GV05mand_upu:0: Śāntipāṭaḥ oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhiryajatrāḥ |
GV05mand_upu:2: svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ |
GV05mand_upu:3: svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatir dadhātu ||
GV05mand_upu:13: omityetadakṣaramidaṃ sarvaṃ tasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavadbhaviṣyaditi sarvamoṅkāra eva |
GV05mand_upu:16: sarvaṃ hyetad brahmāyamātmā brahma so 'yamātmā catuṣpāt ||
GV05mand_upu:18: jāgaritasthāno bahiḥ prajñaḥ saptāṅgaḥ ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ sthūlabhugvaiśvānaraḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ ||
GV05mand_upu:23: yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati tatsuṣuptam |
GV05mand_upu:24: suṣuptasthāna ekībhūtaḥ prajñānaghana evānandamayo hyānandabhukcetomukhaḥ prājñastṛtīyaḥ pādah
GV05mand_upu:27: yoniḥ sarvasya prabhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām Māṇḍūkya Kārikā
GV05mand_upu:29: bahiḥ prajño vibhurviśvo hyantaḥ prajñastu taijasaḥ |
GV05mand_upu:30: ghanaprajñastathā prājña eka eva tridhā smṛtaḥ ||
GV05mand_upu:33: ākāśe ca hydi prājñastridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ ||
GV05mand_upu:38: sthūlaṃ tarpayate viśvaṃ praviviktaṃ tu taijasam |
GV05mand_upu:39: ānandaśca tathā prājñaṃ tridhā tṛptiṃ nibodhata ||
GV05mand_upu:41: triṣu dhāmasu yadbhojyaṃ bhoktā yaśca prakīrtitaḥ |
GV05mand_upu:42: vedaitadubhayaṃ yastu sa bhuñjāno na lipyate ||
GV05mand_upu:56: nāntaḥ prajñaṃ na bahiḥ prajñaṃ nobhayataḥ prajñaṃ na prajñānaghanaṃ na prajñaṃ nāprajñam
GV05mand_upu:57: adṛśyamavyavahāryamagrāhyamalakṣaṇamacintyamavyapa deśyamekātmapratyayasāraṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śāntaṃ śivamadvaitaṃ caturthaṃ manyante sa ātmā sa vijñeyaḥ ||
GV05mand_upu:63: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhastu dvau tau turye na siddhytaḥ ||
GV05mand_upu:65: nātmānaṃ na paraṃ caiva na satyaṃ nāpi cānṛtam |
GV05mand_upu:69: bījanidrāyutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate ||
GV05mand_upu:72: na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ turye paśyanti niścitāḥ ||
GV05mand_upu:80: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ |
GV05mand_upu:84: upadeśādayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate ||
GV05mand_upu:87: pādā mātrā mātrāśca pādā akāra ukāro makāra iti ||
GV05mand_upu:89: jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaro 'kāraḥ prathamā mātrāpterādimattvādvāpnoti ha vai sarvān kāmānādiśca bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
GV05mand_upu:91: svapnasthānastaijasa ukāro dvitīyā mātrotkarṣād ubhayatvādvotkarṣati ha vai jñānasantatiṃ samānaśca bhavati nāsyābrahmavitkule bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
GV05mand_upu:93: suṣuptasthānaḥ prājño makārastṛtīyā mātrā miterapītervā minoti ha vā idaṃ sarvamapītiśca bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
GV05mand_upu:104: triṣu dhāmasu yastulyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetti niścitaḥ |
GV05mand_upu:108: makāraśca punaḥ prājñaṃ nāmātre vidyate gatiḥ ||
GV05mand_upu:111: evamoṅkāra ātmaiva saṃviśatyātmanātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda |
GV05mand_upu:114: oṅkāraṃ pādaśo vidyātpādā mātrā na saṃśayaḥ |
GV05mand_upu:115: oṅkāraṃ pādaśo jñātvā na kiñcidapi cintayet ||
GV05mand_upu:117: yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavo brahma nirbhayam |
GV05mand_upu:118: praṇave nityayuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit ||
GV05mand_upu:120: praṇavo hyaparaṃ brahma praṇavaśca paraḥ smṛtaḥ |
GV05mand_upu:124: evaṃ hi praṇavaṃ jñātvā vyaśnute tadanantaram ||
GV05mand_upu:130: oṅkāro vidito yena sa munirnetaro janaḥ ||
